snippet: Stan Kasten, president of the Dodgers, plans to build on the team's recent success and nurture the franchise's scouting and development.
abstract: Stan Kasten, president of the Dodgers, plans to build on the team's recent success and nurture the franchise's scouting and development.

headline.main: Dodgers Are Starting to See Better Days
headline.print_headline: Extra Bases: Dodgers See Better Days
